title: crosssite scripting XSS or CSS
extract: Cross-site scripting (XSS or CSS) Cross-site scripting (XSS or CSS) is a Web application attack used to gain access to private information by delivering malicious code to end-users via trusted Web sites.
extract_html: Cross-site scripting (XSS or CSS) Cross-site scripting (XSS or CSS) is a Web application attack used to gain access to private information by delivering malicious code to end-users via trusted Web sites.
